extendedInfo.description: Easily compare the unit prices of two different sized items. Simply enter the price and size of each item and the QuickUnit Price Comparer will tell you the unit price for each item and which is the better deal!v1.1-Added numeric keypad

reviews.title: Love! 10*
reviews.comment: perfect. Love it. Small and basic program, easy to use, doesn\'t kill phone performance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, easy to use. Built in unit conversion and simple calculator (for price per item when listed price is for multiple items) would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems shady in listing permissions
reviews.comment: Required permissions listed in the Play Store (Market) as only \"Network communication\".  After installing, a look at Settings/Apps shows its permissions as \"Storage\", \"Network Communications\" and \"Phone Calls\".  Phone Calls?!  That\'s a pretty big one to leave out.  And pretty shady if you ask me.  On top of that, as an app, you have to compare items with similar units (ounces to ounces, etc.).  It doesn\'t do the math between things like liters and ounces allowing you to determine if it\'s better to buy the 2 ltr bottle or the 12oz cans which are on sale.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, clean, and easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This program isn\'t useful for me without unit conversions (kg to lb for example). The keypad is nice though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Says cannot compute due to input Error
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: add option for currency selection and also add \'Rs\' symbol in currency selection
reviews.author: A Google User
